channel.title: Startup file does not load
channel.description: Hi there, I have two Axolotis that share the same power supply. The first one works perfectly. The second one does its booting twice when I power the system (even when I power it with usb cable). The flashing LED sequence one booting is done twice. The start up file does not boot. I need to eject the SD card and insert it again to load the startup file. Any idea how to solve it?? Thanks in advance.

item.title: Startup file does not load
item.dc:creator: @johannes johannes
item.description:
@johannes wrote:

With the same patch? Which software version are you using?
Could be a corrupt startup patch in flash memory.

Read full topic

item.title: Startup file does not load

item.description:
@berzelius wrote:

Hi there,
I have two Axolotis that share the same power supply. The first one works perfectly. The second one does its booting twice when I power the system (even when I power it with usb cable). The flashing LED sequence one booting is done twice. The start up file does not boot. I need to eject the SD card and insert it again to load the startup file. Any idea how to solve it??
Thanks in advance.
